security_audit.summary: Pure documentation skill containing only markdown guidance for cultural sensitivity reviews. No executable code, scripts, network calls, or file system access detected. This skill provides OCAP framework references and checklists for human reviewers. All 23 static findings are false positives caused by scanner misinterpreting OCAP principles as cryptographic terms and metadata fields as external calls.

content.value_statement: Code affecting Indigenous communities requires careful cultural review. This skill provides OCAP framework guidance for ensuring cultural sensitivity and Indigenous data sovereignty compliance in your projects.
actual_capabilities: Apply OCAP framework checks for Ownership, Control, Access, and Possession
Evaluate sensitivity levels (Standard, Medium, High, Sacred/Restricted)
Validate approval workflows including Elder review requirements
Perform code review for cultural indicators, consent verification, and privacy enforcement
Identify red flags requiring immediate action
Guide database operation reviews for tenant isolation and audit trails
limitations: Does not enforce cultural compliance automatically
Provides guidance only, requires human judgment
Not integrated directly with any code platform
Does not validate database schemas or API implementations directly

use_cases.title: Feature implementation review
use_cases.description: Review new features affecting storyteller content for cultural compliance before deployment.

use_cases.title: Cultural safety testing
use_cases.description: Verify privacy settings, consent capture, and sensitivity indicators in user interfaces.

use_cases.title: Elder review support
use_cases.description: Guide the approval workflow for high and sacred sensitivity content requiring Elder validation.

prompt_templates.title: Quick compliance check
prompt_templates.prompt: Review this API endpoint code for cultural sensitivity compliance. Check authentication, authorization, sensitivity level handling, and audit logging.

prompt_templates.title: UI component review
prompt_templates.prompt: Check this UI component for cultural sensitivity. Verify privacy indicators, consent status display, Elder approval badges, and respectful language.

prompt_templates.title: Database validation
prompt_templates.prompt: Review these database operations for cultural compliance. Check tenant isolation, ownership fields, consent tracking, and soft delete implementation.

prompt_templates.title: Full feature assessment
prompt_templates.prompt: Perform a complete cultural sensitivity review of this feature. Apply OCAP framework checks, verify approval workflows, identify red flags, and assess sensitivity level implementation.

best_practices: Always verify consent before distributing any storyteller content to external platforms
Ensure Elder approval is explicitly captured and stored for high and sacred sensitivity levels
Implement audit logging for all access and distribution events to maintain transparency
anti_patterns: Bypassing consent verification for internal tools or development environments
Using generic privacy language that does not clearly communicate sensitivity levels
Ignoring existing community guidelines when implementing cultural sensitivity features

faq.question: Which AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code for cultural sensitivity reviews.

faq.question: What OCAP principles are covered?
faq.answer: Ownership, Control, Access, and Possession - the four pillars of Indigenous data sovereignty.

faq.question: Does this skill enforce compliance automatically?
faq.answer: No, this skill provides guidance and checklists. Human judgment is required for final compliance decisions.

faq.question: Can this skill integrate with CI/CD pipelines?
faq.answer: No, this is a prompt-based skill for human reviewers. It does not execute in automated pipelines.

faq.question: Is my review data stored or transmitted?
faq.answer: No, this skill operates entirely in your AI session. No data is stored or transmitted externally.

faq.question: How does this compare to standard code review tools?
faq.answer: This skill focuses on cultural sensitivity, not technical bugs. It complements standard review tools with Indigenous data sovereignty expertise.
